resources.string: Couldn\'t sign in to Mi system account, please try again.
The whitelist only takes effect when the watch\'s SIM card has activated the caller ID service. If not, this function will not take effect.
Watch\'s network signal is poor or it is turned off.
Watch\'s battery is low, it may be turned off.
Sleeping period is active, the watch may be in sleep mode.
Watch has been turned off and will turn on at
%s may not be online, the settings will not take effect until the watch connects to the network.
Watch is not online, its network signal is poor, or it is turned off.
Notification method for messages and incoming calls received by watch.
No watch info acquired, the watch may have been unpaired.
Watch friends can call and send voice messages to the watch.
No number entered. Set it now or modify it in the watch data later.
%s will be downloaded and installed when the watch is being charged and is connected to Wi-Fi
%s will be downloaded and installed when the watch is online
Sending a wake-up SMS message to the watch will temporarily enable its mobile data and make it possible to locate the watch. (Standard SMS rates apply.)
Couldn\'t acquire address info, please try again.
This call request has expired, please send a new call request.
Sending a video call request to %s…
Mobile data will be consumed while connected to a mobile network. Continue anyway?
%s invites you for a video call
%s is currently in a call, please try again later.
Network connection is unstable, the video call will automatically be ended.
%s has an unstable connection, please try again later.
Battery level of %s\'s watch is less than 20%%, please charge it and try again.
%s\'s watch has insufficient storage space and is unable to make a video call, please try again after freeing up space.
%s\'s watch is overheated, please try again later.
%s\'s watch is being charged, please try again later.
%s is temporarily unavailable, please try again later.
Error while calling, the video call will automatically be ended.
Other user has ended the call
%s is currently in a video call, please try again later.
Verification code is invalid, please acquire a new one.
When enabled, the watch will only download firmware updates via Wi-Fi.
Only download firmware updates via Wi-Fi.
Number cannot be empty, unable to become admin.

When real-time tracking is enabled the watch will reports its location in real-time at a 20-second interval, but its power consumption will be increased and its standby time will be reduced. Real-time tracking increases the accuracy when the watch is used outdoors. Please select the real-time tracking duration:
Currently the watch\'s battery is low, it may turn off when this is enabled.
Your child sent and SOS notification, please pay attention.
The watch will automatically record audio of its surroundings and you will receive the recording within one minute under normal network circumstances.
%s has not been located, the network signal may be poor.
The watch will take a photo and you will receive it within one minute under normal network conditions.
Downloading the latest app, stop the download and exit now?
Needs to be enabled in order to refresh
Set an exercise target based on the fitness of your child.
Couldn\'t share, please try again later.
No apps have been installed, cannot share.
Can only be enabled by an admin
Your step count will not be displayed in the family ranking since your phone doesn\'t have a pedometer sensor.
After disabling, you will no longer receive step count target and ranking notifications.
Your child\'s data needs to be set before using the pedometer
%1$s has already completed %2$d steps, please continue the effort.
%1$s has already completed %2$d steps, keep it up.
The watch can only be located when the app is opened, location services are enabled, and there are no safe zone notifications. Do you want to enable power saving mode now?
Phone bill lookup request sent successfully
Phone bill lookup request format error
Phone number of %1$s\'s watch has been changed to %2$s, must be confirmed by the admin.
Up to 3 custom DND periods can be added.
When school mode is enabled the watch\'s mobile data consumption is automatically reduced.
After enabling caller ID on the watch\'s SIM card, only family members are able to call the watch.
SOS notification will send an SMS to the admin
Error logs are generated automatically, but need to be uploaded manually via the watch\'s settings menu.
This is the watch\'s phone number. Make sure it is filled out correctly in order to make calls to the watch.
Ending time cannot be equal to the starting time
You have successfully joined %s\'s family group, please set your info immediately. Otherwise you will not be able to call and send messages to the watch.
Select a time later than today, please select again.
Couldn\'t fulfill request to take a photo

After receiving a monitoring request, the watch will call the number you have selected. Your microphone will be muted. There may be a few seconds delay before the monitoring starts, please be patient.
After receiving a callback request, the watch will call the number you specified. The callback may have some delay, please wait a moment.

The system has sent a pairing request notification to admin %s. Please ask the admin to use this account to sign in to the app, once the admin approves your pairing request you can add family members.
Select a Wi-Fi connection near the watch.

Set home and school as your child\'s safe zones. You will receive a notification when your child leaves from and arrives in these zones, informing you about your child\'s safety in real-time. (Carefully set safe zones, a small safe zone radius is prone to false alarms. A radius of 200 meters or more is recommended.)
The current safe zone radius is less than 200 meters, which may cause false alarms. Please set it carefully.
The currently set zone overlaps with an existing zone.
Up to 10 safe zones can be added.
Notifications when this child leaves or arrives.
Scan QR code to pair watch
The app is running out of storage space and doesn\'t have location permission. \nPlease enable the required permissions in the settings.

The watch will send a request SMS to the carrier to look up your phone bill. You will see the billing info in the contacts interface (the SMS may be delayed due to the network, some carriers may not support phone bill lookup requests). Query SMS content:
Work order has been disabled, unable to use this feature.
%s\'s family was removed by the admin.
Couldn\'t record audio, the time is too short.
Couldn\'t record audio, please check whether recording permission is enabled.
Couldn\'t record remotely, the watch\'s network signal is poor.
Command to record watch\'s audio has been sent successfully.
Who exercised the most in our family today? Find out now…
Who exercised the most in our family today? Find out now…
%s\'s family group was signed out at another location.
You need to agree to the User Agreement and Privacy Policy in order to use this product. You need to connect to the network during use. Agree now?
No safe zone changing notice. Low power consumption.
Please wait for the update to complete
Transferring firmware, please wait a moment…
New features are coming soon, stay tuned.
Please pull down the phone\'s notification bar and tap allow Bluetooth pairing request.
Please confirm and accept the Bluetooth pairing request within 30 seconds.

After enabling the function of White list, only family members are able to call the watch so as to make sure the child isn\'t disturbed by unknown callers. It may take a few minutes to synchronize the family member info with the watch, please wait a moment. (Members that have enabled the short number service must fill out their short number. Otherwise, calls may not be able to get through.)

Family members will be synchronized with the watch\'s contacts. After enabling the caller ID feature, only family members are able to call the watch so as to make sure the child isn\'t disturbed by unknown callers.
You are not authorized to connect to the network. Please enable network permission.
Medium frequency automatic location. Medium power consumption.
Your %s\'s sign-in status has expired, please sign in again.
Already signed in elsewhere, please pay attention to account security.
Configuring watch, please try again later…

When enabled, the watch will report its location regularly and you can check the watch\'s real-time route at any time.\nNote: When enabled, the watch\'s power consumption will be increased and its standby time will be reduced.
"When enabled, your location will be displayed on the map synchronously. Enable GPS and Wi-Fi for more accurate positioning."
Mobile data is disabled due to low battery

When mobile data is turned off, only calls and SOS notifications features are supported. Making calls, sending an SOS notifications, plugging in the charger, or sending a wake-up SMS will briefly connect the watch to the network. There are no restrictions while connected to Wi-Fi.
Disable when the battery level is less than 20% (Recommended)
Disable when the battery level is less than 20%
Watch\'s address has not been located.
Watch version is outdated, the current version doesn\'t support this feature. Please update the watch.
Please set your number in family management
You already have the latest version.
Please select a relationship or enter the correct custom nickname.
No new news at the moment
When the watch receives a call, it will not answer automatically.
No watch alarm clocks added yet
Your phone\'s mobile data and Wi-Fi are not enabled.
Network is currently unavailable. Please check your phone\'s mobile network settings.
Network timeout, please check the network settings.
You do not have the permission to access the camera.
You do not have the permission to record audio.
%1$s is using GPS to return to %2$s…
A previously used device was detected, do you want to migrate the following data?\n1. Contact information\n2. Safe zones
Select the watch you want to migrate data from.
Up to 10 watches can be paired.
Maximum number of watch friends has been reached.
Maximum number of call members has been reached
Poor network signal, please try again later.
Wi-Fi networks with enterprise-level encryption and 5 GHz Wi-Fi networks are not supported. Please make sure the password is correct, otherwise you will not be able to join.
The watch has to be charged for at least five minutes before being turned on, after it has been turned off for a long time.
Sign-in timed out, please check the network connection and try again.
Monitoring request successful, the watch will call back immediately.
Monitoring request has been denied, watch cannot make calls temporarily.

Your %1$s signed in to %2$s using the %3$s account at %4$s . If you did not perform this action, your account %5$s may be compromised. Please sign in to the %6$s account and modify the password as soon as possible.
When enabled, the watch will not disconnect from the Wi-Fi within 15 minutes after the display is turned off. This affects the watch\'s battery life.
%1$s sent a request to join %2$s\'s family group %3$s.

Some features are not working properly because you have enabled \'\'Don\'t save activities\'\'. It\'s recommended to tap the \'\'Settings\'\' button on the bottom right, go to \'\'Developer options\'\' and disable \'\'Don\'t save activities\'\'.
Browsing the Internet via the phone\'s Bluetooth, please disconnect first.
You haven\'t selected a group relationship, this setting is invalid.
Increase watch\'s battery life, but slightly increases the time to load apps.
Up to %s characters can be entered
Press the watch\'s %s to complete pairing after it receives a notification.
Child can make video calls with parents
Mi Kids Smartwatch 4 Pro&Update firmware to make video calls.
Pairing request has been sent to the admin.\n
Pairing will be completed after admin (%s) approves.
Group members can locate the watch, make calls, and send voice messages via the app (please download the app).
Couldn\'t open permission management, please manually open the phone\'s settings.
Please select another photo or take one directly.
Photos in the watch\'s album will automatically be uploaded when the watch is connected to Wi-Fi.
Only selected features will be displayed on the watch, other feature will be hidden.
Your watch friend hasn\'t set your phone number. You can\'t call him/her, please ask your friend to add your watch\'s phone number.
%1$s\'s mobile data limit is %2$s, data consumed until now is %3$s. Please pay attention to the watch\'s data consumption.
%1$s\'s mobile data consumption is %2$s/%3$s, please pay attention to the watch\'s data consumption.
Unable to calculate mobile data consumption beyond the current month.
Once the watch has consumed 80% of the set mobile data the app will notify the user.
The watch\'s mobile data statistics are for reference only. The actual mobile data consumption depends on the mobile carrier\'s calculation.
Enable airplane mode during sleeping periods
High frequency automatic location. High power consumption.
Each watch can only have up to 10 group members.
Couldn\'t send phone bill lookup request
Both primary and secondary numbers can be used to call the watch. However, the watch can only call primary numbers.
Updating watch, this may take about 6–13 minutes… Do not move or use the watch.
Currently connected to a mobile network. Continue anyway?
%s\'s family group was disbanded by the admin
Watch is already using the latest version.
Watch\'s firmware has been updated successfully.
Watch has started updating, do not turn if off.
Updating watch, please don\'t download again.
Couldn\'t update watch, please check its status and try again.
Currently the watch\'s battery is low, please charge before updating.
The SMS whitelist is only effective for the watch, the app will still receive blocked SMS messages.
The watch will automatically turn off/on when entering/exiting a sleeping period. It is recommended to set a period of 3 hours or more to increase battery life.
All functions are unavailable during sleeping, you can quit sleeping by 2 minutes continuously moving or 5 quick pressing on power key, can not enter sleeping when the watch is under charging.
In the school mode，the watch can only view time、send SOS and locating. Parents can contact the child after the school mode is turned off on App.
Scan the QR code to download and install the app. Scan the QR code again to pair with the watch, once the admin approves your pairing request you can add family members.
Scan this QR code to pair watch
This is the watch\'s phone number. Make sure it is filled out correctly in order to make calls to the watch.
Couldn\'t verify watch\'s firmware, please try again.
Watch is not online, please try restarting the watch.
Watch\'s number is empty, please set a number.
Solutions if you cannot pair the watch:
Watch\'s battery level is less than 65%, unable to complete update.
No number in contacts or you don\'t have permission to access contacts

After turning off the watch, it can be turned on by pressing and holding the on/off button, connecting it to the charger, or when the automatically turn on feature is enabled in the app. Turn off now?
Message history will be cleared after tapping OK.

Unpairing will remove all members from family management and clear all data and history related to the watch, such as chat info, notification info, call history, pedometer data, and settings. Please be cautious.
Your phone has been updated to Android N (7.0). To ensure compatibility, the app\'s cache will be cleared automatically. Please sign in again.
Couldn\'t access camera, please check whether camera permission is enabled.
Couldn\'t access camera, please check whether the camera is working normally.
You do not have the permission to make calls.
Only call members can make calls to the watch

After setting the monitoring number, tap the monitor button and the watch will call the specified number. There may be a few seconds delay before the monitoring starts, please be patient. Each group member can only set one monitoring number.

When auto answering is enabled, the watch will automatically answer calls if they are not answered within 15 seconds. Auto answering is enabled by default, you can disable or configure it in watch management.
Couldn\'t connect Bluetooth, please restart the watch and try again.
The phone\'s Bluetooth is already connected to another device, please disconnect first.
Couldn\'t acquire Bluetooth address, please try again.
The phone\'s Bluetooth is disabled, please enable it first.
Bluetooth has been disconnected, unable to transfer firmware to the watch.
Verification code\'s length is incorrect, please enter again.
You have not pressed the watch\'s %s to pair, or its network connection doesn\'t work normally. Please try again in a different location.
Pairing request has been sent, awaiting admin‘s confirmation.

1. Make sure the mobile data of the watch\'s SIM card is enabled and the watch is connected to the Internet. If the watch is still offline, press and hold its button to restart it and try again.\n2. You will hear "connected to network successfully" once the watch is connected. The watch\'s time will be calibrated automatically.
The admin must open the app in order for members to pair to the watch. You can contact the admin directly. The admin can send a new request after opening the app.
Press watch\'s button to acquire verification code
Enter the acquired verification code above

When the watch is connected to the network, press the watch\'s on/off button (single-button watch) or the voice button (double-button watch) 16 times. A 6-digit verification code will be displayed on the watch (single-button watch), or a voice will announce the 6-digit verification code (double-button watch). The code is valid for ten minutes, acquire a new one when it is expired.

Battery level of %1$s\s watch is only %2$s, please charge as soon as possible. If the watch has been turned off for a long time, it may need to be charged for five minutes or more in order to turn on.
Your child\'s exercise data for today
When enabled, the watch will automatically download the latest firmware during the day and update it at night. The watch can also be manually updated via its settings.
When enabled, the watch will automatically download the latest firmware during the day and update it at night.
The current watch can automatically detect and connect to Wi-Fi networks it has connected to in the past.
When the watch receives a call, it will immediately answer automatically.
When the watch receives a call and the user doesn\'t answer within 30 seconds, the watch will answer automatically.
When the watch receives a call and the user doesn\'t answer within 15 seconds, the watch will answer automatically.
Uninstalling will remove all of the app\'s data from the watch. Uninstall %s now?
The watch will automatically download and update apps when it is connected via Wi-Fi and is not being used.
Automatically update apps when connected to Wi-Fi
Automatically synchronize photos with the cloud album when the watch is connected to Wi-Fi.
IMEI on the package or as a QR code in the UI.

APN configuration only needs to be used when the inserted SIM card is not able to connect to the Internet. APN configuration is ineffective during normal use. (In order to configure the APN, the SIM card number, IMEI, APN and proxy port number needs to be filled out. When restoring the default APN, the SIM card number and IMEI needs to be filled out. Contact your SIM card\'s mobile carrier for APN info. If some parts of the configuration are unclear, please refer to the illustration.)

Restore the watch\'s default APN now? Restoring the default APN cannot be undone, and a SMS will be sent to the watch. (If the watch\'s firmware already supports APN configuration, it will restart automatically after receiving the APN configuration SMS.)

Configure the watch\'s APN now? An SMS needs to be sent to the watch to configure the APN. (If the watch\'s firmware already supports APN configuration, it will restart automatically after receiving the APN configuration SMS. If the APN is configured correctly after restarting the watch, the network can be connected to normally.)
Up to 5 alarm clocks can be enabled.
Network error, please try again later.
Please contact the admin to set the watch\'s number
The admin has denied your pairing request.
Request to add a friend has been sent, waiting for the admin of the user\'s watch to respond.
Couldn\'t add friend, please make sure whether the QR code is valid and the watch\'s number is correct.
Admin of the user\'s watch is not online
Couldn\'t add friend because the watch isn\'t paired yet.
Scan the QR code of the user\'s watch
Please enter the phone number of the user\'s watch
It\'s recommended to enable notifications to receive the latest notification messages.
Disable when the battery level is less than 20% (Recommended).Unable to use locations services and chat. The watch can only make calls and send SOS notifications.
%s No answer, please try again later.

1. Make sure the mobile data of the watch's SIM card is enabled and the watch is connected to the Internet. If the watch is still offline, press and hold its button to restart it and try again.
2. If it is temporarily unable to connect to the Internet, try from another location or wait a while and try again later.
3. If it is unable to connect for a long time, press and hold the watch's button for 30 seconds to restart it.
4. Make sure a China Mobile/Unicom nano-SIM card is used in the watch, cards from other carriers may not be able to connect to the Internet.
5. SIM cards from other carriers may need to have its APN settings configured to be able to connect to the network.
Disconnect the watch from the Wi-Fi?
The following mobile data statistics are for reference only. The actual data consumption of each app depends on the mobile carrier.
Watch has not reported data yet
%s\'s running history for the last 30 days.
%1$s completed the challenge target %2$s.\nShare with others\n%3$s completed a challenge.
No challenge award received yet, quickly complete a challenge.%s completed a challenge.
Haven\'t ran once yet, give it a try.
Yesterday %1$s\'s steps were higher than the average of all %2$s children, continue the effort.
Yesterday %1$s\'s steps were lower than the average of all %2$s children. Come on…
Please set the correct height and weight in order to use this feature normally.
Group members can locate the watch, make calls, send voice messages and video call via the app (please download the app).
在防打扰时段内，设备的提示音将会关闭。
During the class period, the watch can only be used to view the time, send SOS, answer the phone, while retaining the positioning function.
Activating and using %s will affect the battery life of the watch. Are you sure to activate it?
In order to help you use this product and service safely, please read carefully and fully understand the "User Agreement" and "Privacy Policy" before use.
If you agree to this protocol and policy, please click “Agree” and start using our products and services. We try our best to protect the security of your personal message.
1. Insert the SIM card tool and open the SIM card cover on the back
2. Embed the Nano-SIM card chip outwards into the SIM card cover
3. Put the card cover installed with the SIM card back on the watch and flatten it.
Long-press the power key for 3 seconds. Green indicator light suggests the boot is successful
Note:\n1) If the device is turned on before inserting the SIM card, it is required to reboot the device to access the network\n2) Long-press the function key for 5 seconds to reboot
(Press the power key to determine the network status)
The blue light is always on, and the network connection is normal
Connected to the network, not connected to the server
No SIM card inserted, no network available
Wait for 30-60 seconds after booting, and then short-press the power key. The binding can be performed when the indicator light is blue

Note: When the indicator light is yellow or red, please try again according to the following steps
1) Please confirm that the SIM card is inserted correctly
2) Please make sure that the SIM card is not in arrears
3) Long-press the power key for 5 seconds to reboot

When the device is connected to the charger, the green indicator light flashes, and the green light is always on when it is fully charged. The red indicator light flashes when the battery capacity is less than 15%.
1. Please rescan the device QR code\n 2. When the blue light flashes, press the device power key to complete the binding
"Your location will be displayed in sync on the map after activation. Please activate GPS for more accurate positioning."
"Your location will be displayed in sync on the map after activation. Please activate WiFi for more accurate positioning."
Off\n Unable to use location or chat functions, making call and SOS only
Indicator light flashing continuously for 30 seconds
Are you sure you want to delete this record?
Watch network error, please try again!
Network connection error. Please check your mobile network and try again later
Operator\'s reminder: Pre-stored call charges cannot be cashed in or refunded, please recharge carefully according to actual needs!
Setting timeout, failed to save custom nickname
After activating the resident notification, you can check the current watch position and battery in the notification bar
Loading failed. Please try again later.
Cloud album sync is off, please set in the watch management
Not enough memory on your watch\'s cloud album. The remaining memory: %sk, please free up your cloud album memory space.
You have been on the phone for almost 5 minutes, please take a rest
You have been on the phone for a long time. Hang up the phone and rest your eyes.
You have been on the phone for almost 10 minutes, please take a rest
Poor network status or no work order

1. If you need to connect to the Internet, please refer to the following points:
· Check the wireless LAN settings in your phone to see if there is an accessible wireless LAN signal.
· Check if the phone is connected to the mobile network and that the phone is not suspended.
 2. If you are connected to a wireless LAN:
· Please check whether the wireless LAN hotspot you are connected to has been connected to the Internet, or whether the hotspot has allowed your device to access the Internet.
 3. Check the network settings of the mobile phone to confirm whether the network access permission of the current APP is enabled.
Change in the phone number of watch “%1$s” detected, and the latest number is: %2$s, please ask the administrator to modify and confirm.
Change in the phone number of watch %s” detected, administrator please add and confirm.
Your watch has resumed, to ensure the normal communication of the watch, please long-press the watch power button for about 30 seconds until the watch emits a “Hi” sound. The reboot is successful!

The watch of %s has been resumed. To ensure the normal communication of the watch, you need to activate watch network. You can choose any of the following methods:\n1, select “Send SMS”. Send a text message for activetion to the watch from the phone.\n2, select “Cancel” and reboot the watch by yourself: long-press the power button of the watch for about 30 seconds until the watch sounds “Hi”. The reboot is successful.
The number of security zones cannot exceed %s
Note: After the migration is successful, reboot the watch to view the migrated data.
The device number of %1$s has been changed to %2$s
You have been on the phone for almost 5 minutes. Please take a rest
%1$s device only has %2$s battery capacity, please charge immediately; If the device is off for a long time, it needs to be charged for more than five minutes before it can be powered on next time

During the sleeping, the device will disable the positioning and call functions to extend the standby time; After continuous movement for two minutes or five key presses, the device will exit the sleeping; it will not sleep while charging.

1. Please make sure that the SIM card of the device has activated 2G data service. If you are not sure, please call the SIM card operator \n2 After receiving a bind request, the device will flash blue light. For the other lights, please refer to the user guide to check the device status
After the device receives the prompt, press the device power key to complete the binding
An update has just been downloaded.Sure restart APP?
Command to record watch\'s video has been sent successfully
What if the message or video call cannot be received?
It\'s recommended to enable alert window to receive the videocall messages.
It\'s recommended to enable the floating window and background pop-up page to receive video call messages.
Please manually enter the notification settings to enable notification
Network connection is unstable, the video call will automatically be ended.
We need to get your storage permissions to store photos, voice and avatars
When the watch\'s power reaches 5%, it only supports checking time, sending SOS and calling
You will exit this app and open a link on another app
The corresponding app has not been installed and cannot be opened

The system will recommend an appropriate exercise duration every day according to the child\'s BMI, parents can add any exercise to achieve the goal of exercise duration, get exercise credits and exchange for a cool watchface.

1. 20 credits can be gained for completing the low-intensity exercise plan every day; 30 credits for completing the medium-intensity exercise plan; and 40 credits for completing the high-intensity exercise plan.\ n2. an extra 30 credits can be gained for a good or excellent performance in the compliance test
Height is a key factor in calculating exercise and health data. To ensure the data accuracy, please fill in your child\'s height and regularly track it.
Weight is a key factor in calculating exercise and health data. To ensure the data accuracy, please fill in your child\'s weight and regularly track it.
Body Mass Index (BMI) is the most commonly used index to judge the physical condition of adults. \n BMI = Weight (kg) ÷ Height2 (m2)
Please enter the item to be added, up to 5 words
Please select the following options for the specified model
Please select the region that matches the "bound watch"
